summary:
location:after you enter the Dragonsearch,you will find a wooden chest at the right side of the door,open it~
\"you are already dead!\" This is a funny weapon,and will break the balance of the game.I added 
some random effect on it,Demo Movie(Version 1.1):http://www.tudou.com/programs/view/ckEPCgHOPXU/?phd=1
descriptionHtml:
Version 1.3 is a failure work,so i upload version 1.4...

It is a two handed weapon.Can be affect by Barbarian perk.
How to get it:
1.After you enter the Dragonsreach,you will find a wooden chest at the right side of the door,open it~ 
2.you can smith it.
Effect:
1.100% soul trap in normal attack(5 seconds,hit shader and sound effect has been removed already).
2.10%(100% in Hyper Mode) absorb 30 health.
3.10%(100% in Hyper Mode) absorb 30 stamina.
4.Sneaking attack has 30% chance to knock down target.
5.Normal attack has 15% chance,back attack has 100% chance to trigger \"you are already dead\" effect(target stop move,explod(target killed) after 3 seconds,blow up and disarm other enemies nearby(HP-50-5*10sec)).
6.Counterattack has 50% chance to trigger a Hyper Mode(slow time for 5 sec,absorb hp\\mp\\sp from enemies nearby,normal attack will hit all enemies(require Sweep perk) and has 50% chance to stagger enemies).

demo movie:http://www.tudou.com/programs/view/2mGfQJ85gDQ/?phd=1
author: jjx01
